headline.print_headline: Cut Out Junk Food Ads in Schools, Government Says
headline.main: Cut Out Junk Food Ads in Schools, Government Says

docs.lead_paragraph: It's not just about what America's kids are getting in the lunch line.
docs.snippet: It's not just about what America's kids are getting in the lunch line.

docs.abstract: A provocative new series by the New York-based fashion photographer David Jay features the faces, and scars, of men with breast cancer.
docs.snippet: A provocative new series by the New York-based fashion photographer David Jay features the faces, and scars, of men with breast cancer.

headline.print_headline: Landmark Hispanic Study May Offer Longevity Clues
headline.main: Landmark Hispanic Study May Offer Longevity Clues

docs.lead_paragraph: The government's largest-ever study of Hispanics' health may help answer why they live longer than other Americans but the first results suggest that for some, the trend might be in jeopardy.
docs.snippet: The government's largest-ever study of Hispanics' health may help answer why they live longer than other Americans but the first results suggest that for some, the trend might be in jeopardy.

headline.print_headline: Landmark Study Examines Hispanic Longevity Paradox
headline.main: Landmark Study Examines Hispanic Longevity Paradox

docs.lead_paragraph: The government's largest study of Hispanics' health aims to answer why they live longer than other Americans, but the first results suggest that trend might be in jeopardy, especially among certain groups.
docs.snippet: The government's largest study of Hispanics' health aims to answer why they live longer than other Americans, but the first results suggest that trend might be in jeopardy, especially among certain groups.

byline.original: By CRYSTAL L. HOYT and JENI L. BURNETTE

docs.abstract: Gray Matter column by Profs Crystal L Hoyt and Jeni L Burnette describes research into whether labeling obesity a disease has a psychological cost that might contribute to its maintenance, rather than its reduction; published in journal Psychological Science, research suggests ideal approach is public health message that leads to decrease in self-blame and stigma while promoting adaptive self-regulation and weight loss.
docs.lead_paragraph: The label removes shame, but makes dieting harder.
docs.snippet: The label removes shame, but makes dieting harder.

headline.print_headline: The Dream of Moving Abroad in Later Life, With Good Health Care
headline.main: The Dream of Moving Abroad in Later Life, With Good Health Care

docs.abstract: Many older Americans who fantasize about retiring abroad find that it can be difficult to get access to affordable health insurance for quality care when they relocate.
docs.lead_paragraph: Retiring to sunnier shores often sounds lovely, but the reality is that, depending on where you go, it can be tricky to get access to quality coverage.
docs.snippet: Retiring to sunnier shores often sounds lovely, but the reality is that, depending on where you go, it can be tricky to get access to quality coverage.
